attributes.additional_details:
If you like ANY punk rock or general rock bands from any era and you want them to be in Derbyshire for a small festival or whatever then give this petition a cheeky sign and before you know it you'll be high as a kite crowd surfing begging the security guys for a grilled cheese!

I can't really word this into a formal description so if you like rock music bands no matter how big or small give this a sign and hopefully our dreams will come true...ROCK ON DUDE
